text.0: slayers of enemies indra and agni accept this day our newborn pure laudation.
text.1: again again i call you prompt to listen best to give quickly strength to him who craves it.
text.2: for ye were strong to gain exceeding mighty growing together waxing in your vigour.
text.3: lords of the pasture filled with ample riches bestow upon us strength both fresh and lasting.
text.4: yea when the strong have entered our assembly and singers seeking with their hymns your favour.
text.5: they are like steeds who come into the racecourse those men who call aloud on indraagni.
text.6: the singer seeking with his hymns your favour begs splendid riches of their first possessor.
text.7: further us with new bounties indraagni armed with strong thunder slayers of the foeman.
text.8: when two great hosts arrayed against each other meet clothed with brightness in the fierce encounter.
text.9: stand ye beside the godly smite the godless and still assist the men who press the soma.
text.10: to this our somapressing indraagni come ye prepared to show your lovingkindness.
text.11: for not at any time have ye despised us so may i draw you with all strengthenings hither.
text.12: so agni kindled mid this adoration invite thou mitra varuṇa and indra.
text.13: forgive whatever sin we have committed may aryaman and aditi remove it.
text.14: while we accelerate these our sacrifices may we win strength from both of you o agni.
text.15: neer may the maruts indra viṣṇu slight us preserve us evermore ye gods with blessings.
